column2: I  am  of the  view  that  there  is  merit  in  the  submissions  made  by  the
learned  Deputy  Solicitor  General  although  the  learned  President's  Counsel

column1: had  sought  to  impress  upon  Court  that  the  only  mechanism  to  apply  the

column2: provisions  of the  Government  Quarters  (Recovery  of Possession  )  Act  in
respect  of official  quarters  belonging  to  a  Provincial  Council  would  have
Possession in respect of official quarters belonging to Provincial Councils.
